name: Frog hopping across a pond
description:
You are a frog hopping across a pond. Using your mouse to aim and jump, leap onto lilypads and meet up with your best friend. There's only so little time you'll be able to spend together, after all. Might as well not waste it.

A very short game for MiniJam.

Credits:

  • Aakash Ghandi - Background Music (Sea of Memory)
  • free sound effects from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/ and https://mixkit.co/
  • Art assets, jump sound effect, and code done by me.
